What do residents in S.F.’s most pro-recall neighborhoods want in a new D.A.?

The Chronicle visited neighborhoods where the vote to recall S.F. District Attorney Chesa Boudin was most decisive. Many residents said they want a more traditional D.A. focused on prosecuting criminals, while others said they still share some degree of Boudin’s enthusiasm for progressive reforms.
